question:
Consider the following statements about India’s trade relations with China:
  1. India’s imports from China have more than doubled over the last decade
  2. In 2016-17, Cotton was the most exported commodity from India to China
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. India’s imports from China have more than doubled over the last decade. It increased from $27 billion in 2007-08 to $61 billion in 2016-17. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. Cotton is the second most exported commodity to China in terms of value. Cotton worth $1.3 billion was exported to China in 2016-17. The Mineral ores, which are used to extract metals or manufacture chemical compounds of metals, were India’s top export to China in 2016-17.
